summary: This changes your skill levels to 100 and all your perks are done.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This Cheat/Command lets you modify your perks AND your skill levels.
If there are any problems just contact me here ore on my gmail.
PS. my gmail is creativeyoshii@gmail.com

Installation:
drag the myperks.txt file to;
C:/programfiles/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data
Run Skyrim and load your save (ore make a new one) and type in console \"bat myperks\" without the \".
author: CreaTiVeYoshii
